mapper.select: SELECT sfi.FUND_ID as fundId, sfi.SHORT_NAME as fundShortName, sfi.FULL_NAME as fundFullName, smc.SHORT_NAME as companyShortName FROM SYS_FUND_INFO sfi inner join sys_mgrcompany smc on smc.COMPANY_CODE = sfi.FIRM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId}
SELECT ifnull( sfi.ETF, 'N' ) AS ETF, ifnull( sfi.ETF_CONNECTION, 'N') as ETF_CONNECTION FROM SYS_FUND_INFO sfi WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1
